fixes.name: Index
fixes.solution_explanation: INDEX() is a Tableau table calculation. In Power BI it must be implemented as a measure (table-calculation context). The original arithmetic ((INDEX()-1)*0.12)-6 is preserved; the INDEX() call is kept as the indexing expression placeholder.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation uses a Tableau table calculation (INDEX()), which requires an aggregate/table-context in Power BI, so it should be created as a measure.
